DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy Quetiapine extend release ( XR ) combination selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) Venlafaxine versus Lithium combination selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor Venlafaxine versus Quetiapine extend release monotherapy subject treatment resistant depression assess change randomisation week 6 Montgomery-Åsberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) total score . As independent objective , primary objective also evaluate two subgroup patient : ( 1 ) patient resistant two previous antidepressant therapy ( 2 ) subgroup patient one previous failure .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Quetiapine XR Monotherapy Augmentation With Lithium Augmentation TRD Patients

Additionally time onset therapeutic effect assess evaluate efficacy data first four day ( Day 4 ) treatment well first week treatment ( Day 8 ) . These analysis also perform subgroups patient 2 fail previous antidepressant patient 1 failure .
